item.title: ESXi Loses Connectivity to VMFS Datastores.
item.description: Introduction This post explains my recent experiences with certain hosts losing access to some of our VMFS datastores. Hopefully it will help someone avoid the pain that I have been through in diagnosing this issues! The Symptoms I was initially made aware of this issue as it appeared that certain hosts were losing connectivity to VMFS datastores. Upon investigation I found the following events being logged very frequently against multiple hosts.
